Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #411608 - - SIDI - Users cannot log in - URGENT [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BhX5h:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the remote session!

As we spoke we did the following:
- optimized the EPP server resources to the current resources allocated. Previously extremely high resources were configured and this caused the slow UI response times.
- we also rebooted the EPP server as it was online for 175 days
- we updated the AD Admin Authentication with the correct LDAP
- we also disabled the "Ignore AD Authentication" option for all admins

These changes resolved the 2 issues the customer experienced.

We are closing this ticket.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
